targets.query: select sku from (select  "sku", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/  AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance, database_name)

select "hardware_type" from (select  "hardware_type", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/  AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance, database_name)
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "object" =~ /SQL Statistics/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "object" =~ /SQL Statistics/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/   AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "object" =~ /General Statistics/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("wait_time_ms", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_waitstats" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceType.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "wait_type"

SELECT   non_negative_derivative("wait_time_ms", 1s) / non_negative_derivative("waiting_tasks_count", 1s)   FROM "sqlserver_azuredb_waitstats" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name'" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "wait_type"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("wait_time_ms", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_waitstats" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceType.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "wait_type"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("wait_time_ms", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_waitstats" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceType.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "wait_type"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'Log Flushes/sec' AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"

SELECT sum("value") FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/   AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "object" =~ /Resource Pool Stats/ AND  "counter" = 'CPU usage %') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT "value" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("counter" = 'CPU usage %' AND "object" =~ /Workload Group Stats/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance"

SELECT "value" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE (("object" =~ /Memory Manager/ OR ("object" =~ /Resource Pool Stats/ AND "counter" =~ /Active memory grant amount/)) AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object"  =~ /Buffer Manager/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/   AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "counter" =~ /sec/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("object"  =~ /Access Methods/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "counter" =~ /sec/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "object" =~/Latches/ AND "counter" =~/sec/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "counter"

list.definition: select sql_instance from (select  "sql_instance", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" where  "engine_edition" = 5 and $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance)
list.label: Server Name
list.name: InstanceName
list.query: select sql_instance from (select  "sql_instance", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" where  "engine_edition" = 5 and $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY="database_name"  WHERE $timeFilter  AND sql_instance =~  /$InstanceName/
list.label: DatabaseName
list.name: DatabaseName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY="database_name"  WHERE $timeFilter  AND sql_instance =~  /$InstanceName/
